text.start_agreement: ⚠️ By continuing to use this bot, you agree to User Agreement!
text.start: To get started, select ⚙️ Neural network mode: 🧢 Stable Diffusion - an image generator using text commands. 📂 ChatGPT - its purpose is to help users communicate, learn and solve various problems. 🦋 Pika labs - neural network that turns your text request into a video. 🌑Deep Ai- image improvement usingneural network technologies.
text.no_requests:
Requests have ended!

Use a Premium subscription for new requests.
text.premium: 💫 To activate neural networks Select a tariff plan
text.premium_course: 🍬My taste is perfect 🌙 Having studied this mini course you will do unimaginable things, with the necessary light details and resolution. Your level rises from user to pro, in just 10-15 minutes of reading. 📘 Guide will help you correctly configure the neural network using pronts and produce the desired result. ⚙️ Promt is: ready-made settings for the image, for example, its resolution, angle, details, light, background, style , atmosphere, quality, etc. p.s the mini course is written without any fuss and overall it’s justa basefor design in midjourney.
text.premium_buy-0: 🖱️ Trial subscription includes: •midjourney v5.2 (50 generations) •сhatGPT 4 (50 requests) •there are no hidden image editing capabilities and ready-madeproducts * we have the cheapest price on the market, on average our competitors have 150 generations for 500 rubles. *with the help of ready-made products, your work will become much better and faster.
text.premium_buy-1: 🌙Extendedsubscription includes: •unlimited generations in Mj •chatGPT 4 unlimited 📁 chatGPT Voice •additional functions in mj (zoom out and others) •secret menu withproducts *Ideal option, full unlimited, the official price from Midjourney for unlimited is $30, ours is 2 times cheaper.
text.premium_buy-2: 🎐 Pro 1440r for 3 months Pro subscriptionincluded: 🥵 •unlimited generations in Mj •chatGPT 4 unlimited 📁 chatGPT Voice •additional functions in mj (zoom out and others) •secret menu with promtami •author's course on mj 🖱️this is the best option, save money and get the original course on Mj by acquiring the necessary basics.
text.premium_buy-3: Course from the creators of the bot. 💫 “My taste is perfect in short: 🌙 After studying the mini course, you will do unimaginable things, with the necessary light details and resolution. Your level rises from user to pro, in just 10-15 minutes of reading. 📘 Thiscourse will help you correctly configure a neural network using pronts and produce the desired result. ⚙️ Promt this: ready-made settings for an image, for example its resolution, angle, details, light, background, style, atmosphere, quality, etc. p.s this mini course is written without water and in general it’s justbase for design in midjourney. Bonus those who purchase this mini course receive ready-made products in the bot as a gift You will have access to the hidden menu of the bot of ready-made products in midjourney —10 ready-made original settings ⚙️ —no boring long texts, no fluff, just to the point. —5-8 pages onlyuseful information Get yourself a course 🍬 “My taste is perfect”

text.premium_buy-5: Extended 399r for 3 months •full unlimited generation create as much content as you want and save money

text.profile_description_course: 🍬 “My taste is perfect” 🌙 Having studied this mini course you will do unimaginable things, with the necessary light details and resolution. Your level rises from user to pro, in just 10-15 minutes of reading. 📘 Guide will help you correctly configure the neural network using pronts and produce the desired result. ⚙️ Promt is: ready-made settings for the image, for example, its resolution, angle, details, light, background, style , atmosphere, quality, etc. p.s the mini course is written without any fuss and overall it’s just abasefor design in midjourney.
text.alert_in_progress: First, wait for the neural network to finish working❗️
text.call_alert_in_progress: First, wait for the neural network to finish working❗️
text.change_mode_sms: ⚙️ Select a neural network to work with:
text.switch_to_chatgpt: Mode selected: 📁 ChatGPT 4 You can enable voice for GPT in the menu: My profile 📘example Promta: Write a post for Telegram (up to 2000 characters) on the topic [topic name] :: write on behalf of a professional [profession name] :: describe the advantages over other solutions :: pay attention to various aspects of [product name] :: avoid clichés and templates
text.switch_to_midjourney: Mode selected: 🧢 Stable diffusion •Write what you want to see on the object in English, separated by commas. • -neg *negative promt* • -steps -scale • no censorship for 18+ erotica ⚙️ Click Customize Stable Diffusion if you want to change the model or drawing style.
text.switch_to_pikalabs: 🎐Pika Labs The neural network turns your text request into a video. Use text for quick results from ready-made items in the menu 🖱️ My Profile
text.switch_to_deepai: 🖼️DeepAI Improve your photos in seconds with the latest AI technologies.
text.switch_to_dalle: 🎈 Dalle 3 An innovative neural network that understands in Russian everything you want to see in the picture, just write what you want to see. 📙 •write directly and clearly for example •draw a 4-page comic about Spider-Man about his battle against Venom
text.expired: Unfortunately, your subscription has expired! Thank you for purchasing this service from us!
text.reg_by_ur_link:
A user has joined using your link!
You have received 5 additional requests!
text.prompt_add: 📘Prompt accepted. Now enter what to replace the highlighted word in the request with.
text.help: To get started, select ⚙️ Neural network mode: 🧢 Stable Diffusion is an image generator using text commands. 📂ChatGPT - its purpose is to help users communicate, learn and solve various problems. 🦋 Pika labs - neural network that turns your text request into a video. 🌑 Deep Ai- image improvement usingneural network technologies.
text.ref_adress:
🤝 Earn requests with our referral system

For each invited user you receive 5 requests
The person you have invited for the entire time:
text.mj_error: An error has occurred! What could be causing this? 1. The parameters are incorrectly specified. (probably) 2. The request contains a prohibited word 3. Error on the server side. Just repeat your request and everything will be fine, don't panic ;)
text.limit_request_today: The limit of 30 requests per day has unfortunately been reached. ☹️ Try requesting the next day.
text.mj_after_progress: 🖱 Done 🤍 Share your work on our forum! @neonixforum 🌑 What to remove an unnecessary object -neg *negative prompt* ⚙️ To generate higher quality, use Upscale
text.mj_after_progress_upscale: 🖱Upscale Done 🤍 Share your work on our forum!
text.pikalabs_after_progress: 🖱Done 🤍 share your work on our forum
text.deepai_after_progress: 🖱Done 🤍 Share your work on our forum!
text.dalle_after_progress: 🖱Ready DALL-E 🤍 Share your work on our forum! @neonixforum
